about_the_game:
Good news! The electronic board game "Cascade" is out, and patrons of the local board game cafe are playing!

Join a group of friends as they play the relaxing path building boardgame, inspired by games of the Suujin Taisen genre. Take your tiles and line them up to connect their bridges, then combine their values to build unique sequences.

Meet the patrons

Play through the main story as Nymo, a new arrival to a local cafe. Meet the regulars as they teach you how to play, where each day uncovers new strategies to explore.

Use your abilities

Learn each characters abilities and control the board state. Collect items and push tiles around the board, change their face value or place hidden traps around the board.

Play Online

Play against a friend in a 1v1 online challenge.

name: Cascade Cafe Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i3 or equivalent
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Join a group of friends as they play "Cascade", a relaxing path building boardgame. Inspired by games of the Suujin Taisen genre. You need to line up your tiles and connect their bridges, then combine their number values to build unique sequences.
